item.title: 美国上市钻井商同意以 1.08 亿美元出售老化自升式钻井平台
item.description: BW Energy 将从同名业主手中收购 Valaris 247【原文：BW Energy to snap up Valaris 247 from its eponymous owner】

item.title: 壳牌、信实集团和ONGC完成具有里程碑意义的亚洲退役项目
item.description: 三方于周一确认完成了这一具有里程碑意义的项目，并指出，随着塔普提油田中段和南段设施的安全拆除，退役工作已经完成。【原文：The three players confirmed completion of the landmark project on Monday and noted that the decommissioning job was accomplished with the safe removal of the mid and south Tapti field facilities】

item.title: 中东钻井巨头获得价值 8.06 亿美元的多钻机长期合同
item.description: 这家总部位于阿布扎比的钻井公司表示，新一代岛式钻机预计将在 2027 年至 2028 年间逐步加入公司的钻井船队，并将通过 Adnoc Drilling 与中国宏华集团之间的战略合作进行开发。【原文：The Abu Dhabi-based drilling player said the new generation of island rigs are expected to gradually join the company’s drilling fleet between 2027 and 2028, and will be developed through a strategic collaboration between Adnoc Drilling and China's Honghua Group】

item.title: 中东钻井巨头获得价值 8.06 亿美元的多钻机长期合同
item.description: Adnoc Drilling 表示，新一代岛式钻井平台预计将在 2027 年至 2028 年间逐步加入公司船队，并将通过与中国宏华集团的战略合作进行开发。【原文：Adnoc Drilling said new generation island rigs are expected to gradually join the company’s fleet between 2027 and 2028, and will be developed through a strategic collaboration with China's Honghua Group】

item.title: 美国海湾地区需要更多产量来抵消潜在的页岩油产量下降：西方石油公司首席执行官
item.description: 今天的挑战是极端的，"维基-霍鲁布说，她补充道，提高美国海湾地区的产量是确保国家能源独立的必要条件。【原文：‘Challenges of today are extreme,’ says Vicki Hollub, who added higher US Gulf output necessary to ensure country's energy independence】

item.title: Adnoc Gas 第一季度业绩强劲，净收入达 12.7 亿美元，资本支出飙升
item.description: 阿布扎比天然气巨头表示，第一季度的资本支出为 5.55 亿美元，主要由 IGD-E2、Meram 等增长项目以及正在进行的维护和停产计划所带动。【原文：The Abu Dhabi gas giant said its capex for the first quarter was at $555 million, primarily led by its growth projects such as IGD-E2, Meram and ongoing maintenance and shutdown programmes】
